attributes.action: decrease school hours and make the quality of schools better
attributes.background: normally school starts around 8:30- 9am, and ends around 3-4pm. As a country we spend most of our hours in work/school. we are one of the hardest working countries in the world. our education index for 2013 was  0.86, 13th in the world. we work more hours than the highest ranked country, Australia.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
